basics.name: Spencer Wells
basics.label: Student
basics.summary: I am a Computer Science and Japanese major at the University of Hawaii working part time on campus at the ITS Help Desk as a Consultant. I expect to graduate in Spring, 2026.

work.summary: Effectively answer phone and email requests to the ITS Help Desk; Reset user passwords and resolve other UH account problems; troubleshoot software, hardware, and networking issues over the phone; Assist walk-in support customers at the IT Center service window; Add and update data into the ITSM system; Monitor network and systems operation; Other duties as assigned.
highlights: Answer phone and email requests to the ITS Help Desk
Troubleshoot software, hardware, and networking issues over the phone alongside other UH account problems
Assist walk-in support customers at the IT Center service window
Mixing, Production, Baking, Sandwiches, Donuts, next day prep
Weighing flour and other ingredients to prepare dough
Proofing the dough and Baking different bread types with different kind of topping and temperature

awards.title: FRC Chairman
awards.summary: My school's robotics team would consistently win the CHairman's Award at FIRST Robotics Compeititions.
